param.label: Size of k for forming the de Bruijn overlap graph

tool.help:
**What it does**
Runs SOAPdenovo_ to generate a genome assembly using single-fragment or paired-end short reads.
Li R, Zhu H, Ruan J, Qian W, Fang X, Shi Z, Li Y, Li S, Shan G, Kristiansen K, Li S, Yang H, Wang J, Wang J. "De novo assembly of human genomes with massively parallel short read sequencing." *Genome Res.* 2010 Feb;20(2):265-72.
.. _SOAPdenovo: http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapdenovo.html
**Parameter list**
k k-mer size for constructing the de Bruijn graph. The appropriate size of k is genome and data set dependent, but a good starting choice might be 75% of the read length.
Insert size For paired-end libraries, the expected insert size.
**Output**
assembly
